# Kristee Joy Dutaro - Frontend / Web Developer Portfolio

> Frontend / Web Developer specializing in React, JavaScript, and modern web technologies.
> Built 30+ touring microsites with map APIs, 6 Chrome extensions.
> Remote developer based in Philippines available for hire.

## About

Kristee Joy Dutaro is a Frontend / Web Developer specializing in JavaScript, React, and modern web technologies. Built and deployed 30+ touring microsites with integrated map APIs, improving load times by ~20% through performance optimization and SEO best practices. Developed 6 Chrome extensions and converted 5+ static templates into custom WordPress themes. Expertise in full-stack development, responsive design, and delivering maintainable, user-focused web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Next.js.

## Technical Skills

**Programming**: JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP, Python
**Web & Platforms**: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, React.js, Next.js, WordPress, Chrome Extensions API, Bubble.io
**Tools & Practices**: Git, GitHub, Figma, Agile/Scrum, SEO Optimization, Cursor, Astro

## Key Projects

- **Tours, Tickets & Hiking Sites** (May 2025 - Present): Built and deployed 30+ touring microsites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with integrated map APIs. Improved load times by ~20% and search visibility.
- **Google Chrome Extensions** (Oct 2024 - Dec 2024): Developed and maintained 6 Chrome extensions using JavaScript and Chrome Extensions API.
- **WordPress Theme Conversion** (Jan 2025 - Apr 2025): Converted 5+ static HTML templates into dynamic WordPress themes.
- **Timesheet Management Web App** (Jun 2024 - Aug 2024): Designed and built MVP timesheet system for ~50 employees using Bubble.io.

## Experience

- **Freelance Frontend/Web Developer** (May 2025 - Present): Building touring and location-based microsites
- **Freelance WordPress Custom Theme Developer** (Jan 2025 - Apr 2025): Custom WordPress theme development
- **Freelance Software Developer** (Oct 2024 - Dec 2024): Chrome extension development
- **Fullstack Developer at Jairosoft Inc.** (Jun 2024 - Aug 2024): Internal timesheet management system

## Technologies Used on This Site

- **Icons**: Lucide Astro

- **Design**: Terminal/developer aesthetic with dark mode
